applied_job_description:
Development of reports, dashboards, and data models using IBM Cognos
Gathering and formalizing business requirements
Creation and optimization of Framework Manager packages
Participation in BI governance and data architecture
Technology watch and continuous improvement
Support, training, and mentoring of junior profiles
Collaboration with DWH & ETL teams
IBM Cognos (Report Studio, Dashboarding, Framework Manager, Data Sets, Data Modules)
SQL (Oracle, SQL Server, Postgres)
Data modeling (Snowflake, Star Schema)
Microsoft Excel (advanced level)
Agile methodology (desired)
5+ years of experience in BI, including at least 3 years with Cognos
An IBM Cognos certification is a plus
Knowledge of Power BI / Tableau is appreciated
French B2 / English B2
candidate_background: Data Engineer at COFICAB TUNISIA, previously worked at PWC TAC TUNISIA and BI4YOU TUNISIA

match_results.technical_skills: Strong experience with Power BI, Tableau, and ETL tools like SSIS, Alteryx, and ODI. Proficient in SQL (Oracle, SQL Server).
match_results.experience_level: Strong experience in BI and data engineering roles
match_results.education: Master Degree in IT with specialization in Statistics and Business Intelligence

strengths: Strong experience with Power BI and Tableau
Proficient in ETL tools such as SSIS, Alteryx, and ODI
Good SQL skills with Oracle and SQL Server
Strong experience in BI and data engineering roles
Proficient in English and French at B2 level
gaps: Lack of direct experience with IBM Cognos
rationale: The candidate has a strong background in BI and data engineering with experience in various tools like Power BI, Tableau, and ETL tools. However, there's a significant gap in IBM Cognos experience and industry-specific knowledge. The candidate's education and language skills are strong points.
risk: The lack of IBM Cognos experience and industry-specific knowledge may require additional training or ramp-up time.
next_steps: Technical interview to assess IBM Cognos skills and industry knowledge
Evaluate the candidate's experience with data modeling and SQL in depth
Consider a skills assessment for ETL and BI tools
